summary: Comprehensive testing of Campus Store marketplace application completed. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with one critical UI issue in signup flow.

ui_bugs.issue: College dropdown options not clickable/selectable in signup form
ui_bugs.details: Dropdown shows colleges but clicking on options doesn't select them. This blocks the entire user registration flow.

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero, categories, features, FAQs
Signup page loads and basic form fields work
Browse page loads and displays items
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical college dropdown selection issue in signup form. The dropdown component is not allowing users to select colleges, which blocks the entire registration process. This is the only major blocker preventing full application functionality.
